Armour.Name: Veil of Forgotten Times
Armour.Description: A cloak that seems to flicker with images of ancient civilizations, lost to time.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Grants the wearer the ability to blend into their surroundings, avoiding conflict.

Armour.Name: Boots of the Chrono Walker
Armour.Description: Boots that leave behind a trail of shimmering time particles, enhancing the wearer's speed.

Armour.Name: Temporal Circlet
Armour.Description: A headpiece that pulsates with a soft glow, seemingly synchronizing with the wearer's thoughts.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Increases resistance to mental attacks and enhances focus.
